edu.mum.cs.waa.fp.as.controller

Class AssessmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mum.cs.waa.fp.as.controller.AssessmentController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/createAssessment")
public class AssessmentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Assessment Controller helps create and list of Assessment. There is edit , delete and navigation option. The navigation option navigates the url that generates questions.
    Author:
    Bharat

    • Method Detail

      • assessmentHomepage

        @RequestMapping(value={"/","/listAssessments"},
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String assessmentHomepage(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        This handler method lists the Assessment Lists from the database. Assessments includes Questions and its Answers. The JSP page ,assessmentHomepage, returned has a option of adding the assessments. The model object sends two things, one is the object and another is the message. The message is sent when the list of assessment is empty invoking to add the assessment/
        Parameters:
        model -
        Returns:

      • addAssessmentForm

        @RequestMapping(value="/addAssessmentForm",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String addAssessmentForm(@ModelAttribute
                                                                                                                    Assessment assessment)
        This method gets form for adding assessment. The Assessment includes name , description and date field in it.
        Parameters:
        assessment -
        Returns:

      • addAssessment

        @RequestMapping(value="/addAssessmentForm",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addAssessment(@ModelAttribute
                                                                                                                 Assessment assessment,
                                                                                                                 org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                                 org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        addAssessment method validates the Assessment fields. It finally saves the assessment in the database. The page is redirected such that it lists the assignments in the database so far. This actually implements the PRG model.
        Parameters:
        assessment -
        result -
        redirectAttributes -
        Returns:

        The method helps to delete the individual assessment. The page is redirected to list the assessments.

      • editAssessmentSave

        @RequestMapping(value="/assessmentEdit/{id}",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String editAssessmentSave(@ModelAttribute
                                                                                                                        Assessment assessment,
                                                                                                                        @PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                        java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                        org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        editAssessmentSave method edits the existing assessment. The id , whose data is to be over-written, is send to the AssessmentService layer to check if the id exists. If it exists it will over-write in the database in that id. Finally it is redirected to the List the Assessment so far , with the edited assessment included.
        Parameters:
        assessment -
        id -
        model -
        Returns:
